description.bulgarian: Подобри цялото оборудване поне до ниво 2.
description.czech: Vylepši veškeré vybavení alespoň na úroveň 2.
description.danish: Opgrader alt udstyr til mindst niveau 2.
description.dutch: Upgrade alle uitrusting tot minstens niveau 2.
description.english: Upgrade all equipment to at least level 2.
description.french: Améliorer tout l’équipement au moins au niveau 2.
description.german: Alle Ausrüstung mindestens auf Stufe 2 verbessern.

description.italian: Potenziare tutto l’equipaggiamento almeno al livello 2.

description.norwegian: Oppgrader all utrustning til minst nivå 2.
